title: Drawing, "Design for a Mirror, with Alternative Suggestions", ca. 1780
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and washes on paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right [unidentified stamp]: N [Lugt 1953b]
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Different details are suggested at left and right. A pair of doves above center, from which are suspended a wreath with two arrows and a chandelier for six candles. Candle brackets at the back. A flower basket on a bracket at lower center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Mirror, with Alternative Suggestions", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and washes on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-208.
